sources.title: LawoftheWolf
sources.description: When Carl Pearson (Dennis Moore) is unjustly convicted of killing his brother, he breaks out of prison with the help of another convict to try to clear his name and also to recover some valuable airplane plans that his brother left behind. He is pursued both by the police and by the real killer, while his fellow escapee tries to turn the situation to his own advantage.

sources.title: Law of the Wolf (1939) RIN TIN TIN
sources.description:
Stars: Dennis Moore, Luana Walters, George Chesebro 
Director: Bernard B. Ray

Carl Pearson has been wrongly convicted of killing his brother. With the help of another convict, he breaks out of prison to try to clear his name and to try to find some valuable plans left behind by his dead brother. But Pearson is being pursued both by the police and by the actual killer.

Carl Pearson has been wrongly convicted of killing his brother. With the help of another convict, he breaks out of prison to try to clear his name and to try to find some valuable plans left behind by his dead brother. But Pearson is being pursued both by the police and by the actual killer.
